name: Fox Funtime
description:
On Fox Showtime, You should watch out for animatronics, The previous security guard complained that the animatronics keep coming into his room, So we left a Music Box machine, So that you keep the animatronics sleeping

CHAPTER 1

Welcome to FOX SHOWTIME! A place where animatronics liven up children's parties! However, 6 children mysteriously disappeared from this family-friendly establishment, so this place closed for An investigation, During the investigation, you are hired to look after the animatronics during the night.
